articles.title: Watch a robot make a prettier omelet than you can - CNET
articles.description: From cracking eggs to scrambling to cooking, this robot has mastered the tricky art of omelets.
articles.content:
Engineers at the University of Cambridge trained a robot to make great-tasting omelets.
Video screenshot by Amanda Kooser/CNET
I struggle with making omelets. They come out as over-browned mutants.… [+1435 chars]
